whatIsSMM.title: What is Strategic Meeting Management?
whatIsSMM.description1: Strategic Meeting Management (SMM) is a disciplined approach to managing enterprise-wide meeting and event activities. It helps organizations gain visibility into their meeting spend, streamline processes, and achieve measurable business objectives.
whatIsSMM.description2: With Event Logic's SMM solution, you can centralize all your meeting and event planning activities, standardize processes, leverage your buying power, and gain valuable insights through comprehensive reporting and analytics.
benefits: Reduce meeting and event costs by 10-25%
Gain complete visibility into meeting spend

centralized.title: Centralized Meeting Management
centralized.description: Manage all your organization's meetings and events in one centralized platform. Gain visibility into all event activities across departments, locations, and business units.
items: Single platform for all meeting types

supplier.title: Supplier Management
supplier.description: Build and maintain a preferred supplier network. Negotiate better rates through volume discounts and leverage your organization's buying power.

budget.title: Budget Control & Approval Workflows
budget.description: Implement standardized approval processes and budget controls to ensure compliance with your organization's policies and procedures.

reporting.title: Comprehensive Reporting & Analytics
reporting.description: Gain valuable insights into your organization's meeting and event spend with detailed reports and analytics. Identify trends, track KPIs, and make data-driven decisions.
items: Spend analysis by department, event type, etc.

assessment.title: Assessment
assessment.description: We analyze your current meeting management processes, identify pain points, and define your SMM goals.

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.description: We develop a customized SMM strategy aligned with your organization's objectives and requirements.

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.description: We configure the platform, set up workflows, and integrate with your existing systems.

adoption.title: Adoption
adoption.description: We provide training, support, and change management to ensure successful adoption across your organization.

caseStudy.title: Success Story
caseStudy.description: A global technology company with over 10,000 employees implemented Event Logic's Strategic Meeting Management solution to gain control over their meeting and event spend.
challenges: No visibility into total meeting spend
results: 35% time savings in the meeting planning process
Complete visibility into meeting spend across all regions
